description: MCC-based expense categories aligned with credit card reward programs

categories.name: Dining
categories.description: Restaurants, cafes, bars, food delivery apps (Swiggy, Zomato)

categories.name: Groceries
categories.description: Supermarkets, grocery stores, BigBasket, Blinkit, Zepto

categories.name: Travel - Flights
categories.description: Airlines, flight bookings, airport services

categories.name: Travel - Hotels
categories.description: Hotels, resorts, lodging, OYO, Airbnb

categories.name: Travel - Railways
categories.description: Train tickets, IRCTC, metro recharges

categories.name: Travel - Cabs & Rideshare
categories.description: Uber, Ola, taxi services, auto rickshaws

categories.name: Travel - Other
categories.description: Car rentals, cruises, travel agencies, MakeMyTrip, Cleartrip

categories.name: Fuel
categories.description: Petrol pumps, gas stations, diesel

categories.name: Utilities
categories.description: Electricity, water, piped gas bills

categories.name: Telecom & Internet
categories.description: Mobile recharges, broadband, DTH, Jio, Airtel

categories.name: Shopping
categories.description: General shopping, online (Amazon, Flipkart) and offline retail stores

categories.name: Entertainment
categories.description: Movies, streaming (Netflix, Prime), gaming, concerts, BookMyShow

categories.name: Healthcare
categories.description: Pharmacies, hospitals, doctors, medical labs, 1mg, PharmEasy

categories.name: Education
categories.description: School fees, universities, online courses, Coursera, Udemy

categories.name: Insurance
categories.description: Life, health, vehicle insurance premiums

categories.name: Government Services
categories.description: Tax payments, govt fees, fines, passport, visa fees

categories.name: Rent
categories.description: House rent via CRED, NoBroker, PayTM, other platforms

categories.name: Wallet & Prepaid Loads
categories.description: Paytm wallet, Amazon Pay balance, gift cards

categories.name: EMI Payments
categories.description: Loan EMIs, credit card EMI conversions

categories.name: Jewellery
categories.description: Gold, diamond, jewellery purchases

categories.name: Cash Advance
categories.description: ATM withdrawals, cash advances on credit card

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Miscellaneous transactions not matching other categories
